metadata.title: CVE-2021-1494 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple Cisco products are affected by a vulnerability in the Snortdetection engine that could allow an unauthenticated, remote attacker tobypass a configured file policy for HTTP. The vulnerability is due to incorrect handling of specific HTTP headerparameters. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending craftedHTTP packets through an affected device. A successful exploit could allowthe attacker to bypass a configured file policy for HTTP packets anddeliver a malicious payload.

criterions.comment: snort package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
